Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Randomly \Ran"dom*ly\ (r[a^]n"d[u^]m*l[y^]), adv. In a random manner. [1913 Webster]

randomly adv : in a random manner; "the houses were randomly scattered"; "bullets were fired into the crowd at random" [syn: {indiscriminately}, {haphazardly}, {willy-nilly}, {arbitrarily}, {at random}, {every which way}]
